summary: A young woman returns to her hometown of Turin to set up a new fashion salon and gets involved with a troubled woman and her three wealthy friends.
cast: Eleonora Rossi Drago|Gabriele Ferzetti|Franco Fabrizi|Valentina Cortese|Yvonne Furneaux|Madeleine Fischer|Anna Maria Pancani|Luciano Volpato|Maria Gambarelli|Ettore Manni|Marcella Ferri|Alessandro Fersen
title: Las amigas
